short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension has 600+ flashcards for the CompTIA Network+ exam. It also has an Amazon link to a study guide.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension provides over 600+ flashcards that are based on the CompTIA Network+ exam objectives. If you are studying for the CompTIA Network+ exam, or wondering how to pass the CompTIA Network+ exam, then look no further than this free chrome extension. With this extension, you can study all of the exam objectives as per the CompTIA guidelines. 

(Note: This extension, while free, is sponsored by Network+ the Simplified Guide which is available on Amazon. There is a button that links to the guide for purchase within the extension. Also note that to keep the extension light weight, there is no option to save flashcards you have studied, and there is no storage of things like user likes, progress etc.)
